span.style: color: rgb(38, 38, 38); overflow: visible; font-size: 24px; line-height: 1.4; width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; word-break: break-word; text-align: center; justify-content: center; align-content: flex-start; align-items: flex-start;
